Name: Mysterious Lab
About the game: The player has two weapons to fight the zombies. The player will find supplyments in zombies's cropse and all the items in the map. Supplyments include bullets, heal medicine, and cards which could be equipped to the weapons and strengthen them. The map and every item is generated randomly and player uses the door to get into another room.
